ComicInfo.Summary:
No Beast So Fierce...: Mrs Trask orgnises a hunting party for the lion that killed her husband.
Gorhemoth - The Garbage Heap That Walks Like A Man Part 2: Can Monkeyman really be running away leaving Ann to deal with Gorhemoth on her own?
Shot On Goal [Part 2]: Chako finds a new boyfried who's not all he claims.
Nicky Nicky Nine Doors [Part 1]: Everbody lets a little evil in the world every now and then.
